message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that holds significant value for your business. My asking price is $1,000,000, a price that reflects the product's worth and provides you with a substantial return on your investment. This is a unique opportunity to gain a competitive edge, and I'm confident this product will be a valuable addition to your operations.  I understand this is a significant decision, so please take your time to consider.  If you decline, I will be moving forward with another buyer.
